description: Try our easy to follow Spicy Salt & Pepper Squid recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spicy Salt & Pepper Squid Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Put the chili and scallions into a slotted spoon and gently lower the spoon into the hot oil for a few seconds. Serve the squid with a sprinkling of cilantro and the crispy chili and scallions.
